QUESTION.INSTRUCTION: Indicate how much the statement applies to you using the sliding scale below.

TESTLIST.HONE: We offer a variety of personality tests & inventories sourced from the International Personality Item Pool (http://ipip.ori.org)

TESTLIST.TITLE: Available Test
TESTLIST.P: We offer a variety of personality tests to suit your companies needs.

TESTLIST.TITLE: Test Name
TESTLIST.AGREED: A person with a high level of agreeableness in a personality test is usually warm, friendly, and tactful. They generally have an optimistic view of human nature and get along well with others
TESTLIST.CONSCIENTIOUSNESSD: A trait characterized by organization, purposeful action, self-discipline, and a drive to achieve.
TESTLIST.EMOTIONALD: A trait characterized by a steadiness of mood, ability to withstand minor setbacks, failures, difficulties, and other stresses without becoming upset emotionally
TESTLIST.EXTRAVERSIOND: Defined as a behavior where a person enjoys being around people more than being alone.
TESTLIST.INTELLECTD: The faculty of reasoning and understanding objectively, especially with regard to abstract or academic matters.
